name: Heart of Zarar
description:
Made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2013 in Melbourne, Australia.

Heart of Zarar is a game in which the player controls Spaceman Jones through a complex bio world. The player will experience the surrounding environment to change according to the living heart beat of the ship. The player will encounter many dangers which will try prevent Spaceman Jones from escaping. The player must navigate through each level safely avoiding spikes and electric doors in order progress to the following stages.

For the best experience please use headphones.

The game can also be downloaded for Android phones: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.zzymyn.ggj2013
(I recommend this as the Windows build occasionally breaks on some PC's but plays perfect on phone.)

CREDITS
